My Story

Welcome to NosytLabs! Founded in 2025, this portfolio represents my journey as a developer and content creator. The name embodies my core belief: Notable Opportunities Shape Your Tomorrow.

I'm passionate about exploring new technologies, building practical solutions, and sharing knowledge through content creation. My work spans web development, AI integration, and creating educational content on platforms like YouTube (@TycenYT) and Kick.com.

This portfolio showcases my actual projects, learning journey, and the authentic challenges I've faced while growing as a developer. Every project here represents real work, real learning, and real progress.

Mission & Values

Continuous Learning

Always exploring new technologies and improving skills

Knowledge Sharing

Creating content to help others learn and grow

Authentic Work

Building real solutions to real problems

Community Focus

Contributing to the developer community

Current Focus

Web Development

Building modern web applications with React, Astro, and TypeScript

AI Integration

Exploring AI tools and integrating them into development workflows

Content Creation
